import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Button, Col, Form, Row } from "react-bootstrap" import Message from "../../components/message/Message" import Loader from "../../components/loader/Loader" import Axios from "axios" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux" import "./createProduct.scss" import { createNewProduct } from "../../redux/product/productAction" const CreateProduct = ({ history }) => { const createdProduct = useSelector((state) => state.productReducer) const dispatch = useDispatch() const { createProductState, loading } = createdProduct const { _id } = createdProduct.product useEffect(() => { if (createProductState && !loading) { history.push(`/admin/productslist`) } }, [createProductState, dispatch, loading]) const [productInfo, changeProductInfo] = useState({ name: "", price: "", image: "", brand: "", description: "", countInStock: "", category: "", uploadImage :null }) const [imageUpladState, setimageUpladState] = useState(false) const uploadFileHandler = async(e) => { const file = e.target.files[0] const formData = new FormData() console.log(formData); formData.append("image", file) ch } const { name, price, image, brand, description, countInStock, category, uploadImage } = productInfo const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch( createNewProduct({ name, price, image, brand, description, countInStock, category, uploadImage }) ) } const productInfoOnChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target changeProductInfo((preval) => { return { ...preval, [name]: value, } }) } return (
{loading && }

create new product
